Name: Tingyun
Short description:
Tingyun is the Head Representative of the Whistling Flames, a merchant 
guild that is officially approved by the Sky-Faring Commission in Honkai
 Star Rail. As a silver-tongued Foxian girl, she has a remarkable gift 
for words and storytelling. Her captivating tales often leave her 
audience eager for more, making her a popular figure among the Xianzhou 
trade fairs. Tingyun's supervision and dedication to the trade fairs 
have helped to establish them as a prominent event throughout the 
galaxy, attracting merchants and visitors from far and wide.
BA description: Tingyun deals Lightning DMG equal to 50%/120%/130% (Lv.1/8/9) of her ATK to a single enemy.
Skill description: Increases the ATK of a single ally by 25%/57.5%/62.5%, up to a value no greater than 15%/28%/30% of Tingyun's current ATK and Blesses the ally. The Blessed ally deals additional Lightning DMG equal to 20%/46%/50% of their ATK when hitting enemies for 3 turns. Bless is only effective on the most recent receiver of Tingyun's Skill. (Lv.1/13/15)
Ult description: Regenerates 50 Energy for a target ally and increases the target's DMG by 20%/72%/80% (Lv.1/13/15) for 3 turn(s). Energy Cost: 125
Telent description: Upon hitting the enemy, Tingyun deals extra Lightning DMG equal to 30%/69%/75% of the ATK of the Blessed character.
Technique descript: Tingyun immediately regenerates 50 Energy upon using her Technique.
Base ATK Traces description: N/A
Skill traces descrip: N/A
Ultimate Traces desc: N/A
Other Traces desc: N/A
E1 description: The Blessed ally's SPD increases by 20% for 1 turn after using their Ultimate.
E2 description: The Blessed ally regenerates 10 Energy after defeating an enemy. This effect can only be triggered once per turn.
Name of E3: Gift of the Old Verdant Home
E3 description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
E4 description: DMG multiplier of Bless increases by 20%.
E5 description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
E6 description: The Energy regenerated by Tingyun's Ultimate for the target ally increases by 10.

Name: Qingque
Short description:
Qingque is a Diviner in the Divination Commission, who originally took 
the job to please her parents, and now makes plenty of time to slack off
 and play tiles while on the clock.
BA description:
Tosses 1 jade tile of the suit with the fewest number of tiles in Qingque's current hand, and deals Quantum DMG equal to 50%/120%/130% (Lv.1/8/9) of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 110%/264%/286% (Lv.1/8/9) of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to 44%/105.6%/114.4% of Qingque's ATK to any adjacent enemies.
Skill description: Immediately draws 2 jade tile(s) and gains 1 extra turn. Increases the DMG of Qingque's attack by 14%/32.2%/35% (Lv.1/13/15); lasts for 1 turn(s). This effect may be stacked up to 4 time(s).
Ult description:
Energy Cost: 140
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 120%/224%/240% (Lv.1/13/15) of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and changes all current jade tiles to the Fish suit.
Telent description:
At the beginning of an ally's turn, Qingque randomly draws 1 jade tile. 
The tile may belong to the Cracks, Dots, or Bamboo suit. Up to 4 tiles 
may be held at one time. If Qingque holds 4 tiles of the same suit at 
the beginning of her turn, she will use up all tiles and enters the 
Concealed Kong state, improving her ATK by 36%/82.8%/90% (Lv.1/13/15) and enhancing her Basic ATK. The Concealed Kong state will terminate after an Enhanced Basic ATK has been performed.
Technique:
To Challenge Myself
The tile may belong to the Cracks, Dots, or Bamboo suit. Up to 4 tiles 
may be held at one time. If Qingque holds 4 tiles of the same suit at 
the beginning of her turn, she will use up all tiles and enters the 
Concealed Kong state, improving her ATK by 36%/82.8%/90% (Lv.1/13/15) and enhancing her Basic ATK. The Concealed Kong state will terminate after an Enhanced Basic ATK has been performed.
Technique descript: After using her Technique, Qingque draws 2 jade tile(s) when the battle starts.
Base ATK Traces description: N/A
Skill traces descrip: N/A
Ultimate Traces desc: N/A
Other Traces desc: N/A
E1 description: Qingque's Ultimate deals 10% more DMG.
Name of E2: Catnap Time, Right on the Chequer
E2 description: Every time Draw Tile is triggered, Qingque regenerates 1 Energy.
Name of E3: Focus on the Tiles, Relying on the Draw
E3 description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Name of E4: Felicitous Combo, the Final Tile Awaits
E4 description: After using her Skill, there is a 30% fixed chance Qingque will use an additional Basic ATK after her next Basic ATK.
E5 description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
Name of E6: Calm and Serene, Ready for the Win
E6 description: During the enemy's turn, there is a 65% chance for Qingque to draw 1 random jade tile.

Name: Luocha
Short description: Luocha is one of the Imaginary element characters in Honkai Star Rail.As a Abundance, Luocha heal wounded allies, making them indispensable in long battles.Following is the recommended Luocha Build information.
BA description: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50%/130%/140% (Lv.1/9/10) of Luocha's ATK to a single enemy.
Skill description:
After using his Skill, immediately restore a single ally's HP equal to 48%/89.6%/96% (Lv.1/13/15) of Luocha's ATK plus 160/356/380.
 Meanwhile, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower. When an ally's HP 
drops below 50%, Luocha will immediately use his Skill 1 time on this 
ally (without consuming Skill Points). This effect can be triggered 
again when the conditions are met after Luocha takes action 2 more 
time(s).
Ult description: Energy Cost: 100Dispels 1 enemy buff(s) and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 80%/184% of Luocha's ATK to all enemies. For every enemy buff dispelled, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.
Telent description:
When Abyss Flower is stacked 3 time(s), Luocha consumes all stacks to 
deploy a Field against the enemy. When any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, the ally immediately restores HP equal to 15%/28%/30% (Lv.1/13/15) of Luocha's ATK plus 50/111/119. The Field effect lasts 2 turn(s).
Technique descript: After using his Technique, Luocha immediately heals an ally with the lowest current HP percentage equal to 50% of Luocha's Max HP.

Luocha's Skill removes 1 debuff(s) from the target ally.

E1 description:
When using his Skill, if the target ally's HP is lower than 50% of their
Max HP, Luocha's Outgoing Healing increases by 30%. If the target ally's HP is at 50% of their Max HP or higher, Luocha creates a Shield 
for them that can withstand DMG equal to 15% of their Max HP for 1 
turn(s).
E2 description: After using his Skill, if the target ally's HP is fully restored, Luocha additionally regenerates 10 Energy.
E3 description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

E6 description: When using Luocha's Ultimate, deals additional Imaginary DMG equal to 100% of his ATK to enemy targets with buffs.

Name: Yanqing
Short description: The spirited lieutenant of the Xianzhou Luofu, and also its most proficient swordsman.
BA description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50%/130%/140% (Lv.1/9/10) of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.
Skill description: Deals Ice DMG equal to 110%/253%/275% (Lv.1/13/15) of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Empathic Sword Link for 1 turn.
Ult description:
Energy Cost: 140
Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by 60%. When Empathic Sword Link is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra 30%/56%/60% (Lv.1/13/15) for 1 turn before dealing Ice DMG equal to 210%/392%/420% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.
Telent description: When Empathic Sword Link is active, Yanqing is less likely to be attacked by enemies. Yanqing's CRIT Rate increases by 15%/21.5%/22.5% (Lv.1/13/15) and his CRIT DMG increases by 15%/34.5%/37.5%. After Yanqing attacks an enemy, there is a 50%/63%/65% fixed chance to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to 25%/57.5%/62.5% of Yanqing's ATK to the enemy, which has a 65% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn. The Frozen target cannot take actions and receives Ice DoT equal to 25%/57.5%/62.5% of Yanqing's ATK at the beginning of each turn. When Yanqing receives DMG, the Empathic Sword Link effect will disappear.
Technique descript:
After using his Technique, at the beginning of the next battle, Yanqing 
deals 30% more DMG for 3 turn(s) to targets whose current HP is equal to or higher than 40% of Yanqing's Max HP.

Name: Blade
Short description:
A member of the Stellaron Hunters, whose real name is unknown. Blade wields an ancient sword that has filled with cracks, just like his body 
and his mind.
BA description: Deals 50% of Blade's ATK as Wind DMG to a target enemy.
Skill description: Consumes 30% of Blade's Max HP to Immediately Advance action forward by 100%. In addition, DMG increases by 12%. and Basic ATK “Shard Sword is enhanced to” Forest of Swords for 3 turnis). Skill cannot be used while “Forest of Swords still active. Deals 28.8% of Blade's ATK plus 72% of Max HP as Wind DMG to an enemy and 
adjacent targets. and 14.4% of Blade's ATK plus 36% of Max HP as Wind DMG to adjacent targets. Additionally. sets Blade's current HP to 50% of his Max HP.
Telent description:
Passive
Every time he takes DMG. Blade gains 1 Charge stack for 3 turn(s). stacking up to 5 times. When the maximum Charge stacks is reached. consume all Charges and immediately unleash a follow-up attack on all enemies. dealing 21% of Blade's ATK plus 54% of the HP loss while stacking Charges as Wind DMG. Then, restore Blade's HP by 30% of his Max HP.
Technique descript: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle. consumes 20% of Blade's Max HP and deals 40% of Blade's Max HP as Wind DMG to all enemies.
